<template>
 <Header/>

 
 <Footer/>
</template>

<script>
// b1: import vào

import Header from './components/ComHeader.vue'

import Footer from './components/ComFooter.vue'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {

    Header,
    Footer,
 
  },  mounted() {
    this.$store.dispatch('fetchProducts'); // Gọi API khi ứng dụng load
  },
  
}
</script>

<style>
#app {

  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
